snippet: Good cellphone reception is a must-have for many in New York.
abstract: Cellphone signals in New York City apartments can be improved by signal repeater, personal base station called femtocell, or by making calls and texting over Wi-Fi.
lead_paragraph: Good cellphone reception is a must-have for many in New York.

headline.main: How to Improve Your Cellphone Signal at Home
headline.print_headline: How to Improve Your Cellphone Signal at Home
